scripts.clean: bash -c 'turbo kill || true; rm -rf .pages web/dist apps/*/dist services/*/.turbo services/*/.pages; rm -rf .turbo 2>/dev/null || true; rm -rf node_modules 2>/dev/null || true'
scripts.compose:pages: bash -c 'mkdir -p .pages && cp -r web/dist/* .pages/ && mkdir -p .pages/apps && if ls apps 1> /dev/null 2>&1; then cp -r apps/* .pages/apps/ || true; fi && cp .pages/index.html .pages/404.html'
scripts.start:fast: yarn build && yarn compose:pages && yarn serve:pages
scripts.start:fresh: yarn kill && yarn clean && yarn install:all && yarn start:fast
